tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sea_level_data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  sea_level_height FLOAT,
  erosion_level VARCHAR(50),
  date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE sea_level_rise_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    date DATE,
    sea_level_height FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE coastal_erosion_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    erosion_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE adaptation_projects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE monitoring_stations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    station_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    installation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE personnel (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    job_title VARCHAR(255),
    contact_info VARCHAR(255)
)
